text: "My Bologna" is a single by "Weird Al" Yankovic. It is a parody of "My Sharona" by The Knack. It was released in 1979. It was Yankovic's first single. It was re-recorded and added to Yankovic's self-titled debut album. ==References== Category:"Weird Al" Yankovic songs Category:1979 songs Category:Parodies
title: My Bologna
